name: Out Of CTRL (jamfizz)
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Out of Control".

Your computer suddenly goes off the rails, but you can't restart it because your precious Control keys have mysteriously disappeared. Lucky for you, an ad for a shiny brand new Control key has appeared, but it's quickly buried under a mound of annoying pop-ups...

Close all the pop-ups and avoid the computer-exploding glitches while racing to beat your own time in this human vs. computer click-em-up!

Credits (also featured in game):

  • Coding, art, and some sound made by me
  • "Chunky Explosion" by Joth
  • "Raining Bits" by Gundatsch (https://soundcloud.com/gundatsch)
  • "Summer Sunday" by celestialghost8
  • "Glitchy Battle" by 3xBlast
  • Obelus by Orvin Scripello
